commands.command:
SELECT
'['+s.Name + '].['+ t.NAME+']' AS TableName , p.rows AS RowCounts, SUM(a.total_pages) * 8 AS TotalSpaceKB, SUM(a.used_pages) * 8 AS UsedSpaceKB, (SUM(a.total_pages) - SUM(a.used_pages)) * 8 AS UnusedSpaceKB, 'select top 1000 * from ' + '['+s.Name + '].['+ t.NAME+']' AS SQlSelect, 'delete from ' + '['+s.Name + '].['+ t.NAME+']' AS SQLDelete, 'truncate table ' + '['+s.Name + '].['+ t.NAME+']' AS SQLTruncate FROM sys.tables t INNER JOIN sys.indexes i ON t.OBJECT_ID = i.object_id INNER JOIN sys.partitions p ON i.object_id = p.OBJECT_ID AND i.index_id = p.index_id INNER JOIN sys.allocation_units a ON p.partition_id = a.container_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id WHERE t.is_ms_shipped = 0 AND i.OBJECT_ID > 255 --AND p.rows >0 /*UWAGA tylko jesli jest rekordow > 0*/ GROUP BY t.Name, s.Name, p.Rows ORDER BY 4 desc
